instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2141: What is A2141? A2141 is a model number for a 16 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3347, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01700..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message: Good morning, I have this equipment with the problem that it does not charge the battery. I am using an original 87w magsafe and I have tried to change the battery but the problem continues. any ideas? Thanks everyone for ur help

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message:
"I am using an original 87w magsafe"
This machine requires 96W charger; accepts 140W too.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message: hi again, now I have 96W charger but same problem..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message:
Is the battery recognized at least?
Any history available?

Be sure the flex cable makes good contacts; check the terminal from battery side too.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message:
The computer did not turn on, with a new battery it did turn on but the message "the battery is not charging" came out one day it stayed on and went down to 5% now it turns on the apple comes out and halfway through the progress bar it turns off.

I'm going to check the connections as it says

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message:
I check all connections and change with other battery

add pics:

[ATTACH]61037[/ATTACH][ATTACH]61038[/ATTACH]

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message:
Save data and do DFU restore.
Reinstall the original macOS which came with this machine.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message:
I have tried several cables, including new ones, and I can't finish the process.

I am going to try to charge the battery again and repeat the process with a battery with at least 50% charge
[ATTACH]61055[/ATTACH]

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message:
Try flashing <CHIP>U4770</CHIP>.
Don't forget to make a backup first.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message: uhm sorry but I don't have this tool, do u know anyone?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message: sorry I have one, thanks for all. We will talk when you receive the tool you can do this test

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> battery no charger
threads.message: hi again !! 1000000000000 thanks ! now I can charger my batery and full work ! thx so much
